description: This Dart file defines the SalesPage widget and related components for a Flutter app, managing sales orders including listing, creating, and editing orders.

classes.name: SalesPage
classes.description: A stateless widget displaying a list of sales orders with an option to create new or edit existing orders.

classes.name: SalesOrderFormSheet
classes.description: A stateful widget providing a form to create or edit a sales order within a modal bottom sheet.

methods.name: _openForm
methods.description: Opens a modal bottom sheet to create a new sales order or edit an existing one.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the SalesPage widget with a scaffold, app bar, floating action button, and list of sales orders.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles form submission to create or update a sales order in the data service.
